item.title: KPIT Technologies Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 29 Jan 2026
item.description: KPIT Technologies Ltd experienced a notable intraday decline on 29 Jan 2026, hitting a low of Rs 1,050.6, reflecting significant price pressure despite an initial positive opening.
